text: Avenging Force is a 1986 American action movie directed by Sam Firstenberg and written by James Booth (who also starred). It stars Michael Dudikoff, Steve James, John P. Ryan, Marc Alaimo and was distributed by Cannon Films. It is considered to be a cult film. ==Other websites== * * Category:1986 action movies Category:1980s sequel movies Category:American action movies Category:American independent movies Category:Movies directed by Sam Firstenberg Category:Movies set in New Orleans Category:1986 independent movies
title: Avenging Force
